title: mAtA innum vAtA
sahitya:
mAtA innum vAtA uyar tiru mayilaiyin nAyakiyE tAyE sakala lOka


anupallavi

  pAdAra vindam aladu vErenda bhAgyamum virumbA tozhumban enniDam jagan


caraNam    Ezhai endan muraiyIDu unran iru sevigaLil vizhAdaden tIvinaiyO
pAzhAm at-tIvinayai vEruDan kaLainderiya tiruvarut-tiran ilaiyO
tAzha vizhum enai mElum vizhaviDudal dharmamO iduvum varmamO
tALinai caraN ena nambinEn ammA rAmadAsan tozhum kalpaka nAyaki
